check.name: MultiFileRegexpHeader
check.description: Checks the header of a source file against multiple header files that contain patterns for each line of the source header. The check passes if the file header matches any of the specified header files.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify the file extensions of the files to process.

property.name: headerFiles
property.description: Specify a comma-separated list of header files to check against. The check passes if the file header matches any of the specified header files.
